title: Introduction to Operations Research 10th c2015 Hillier txtbk
description:
Introduction to Operations Research, 10th Edition (c2015), textbook by Frederick S. Hillier & Gerald J. Lieberman.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://highered.mheducation.com/sites/0073523453/information_center_view0/index.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://highered.mheducation.com/sites/0073523453/information_center_view0/index.html</a>
(ISBN-10: 0073523453)

BRIEF CONTENTS:
---------------
1. Introduction
2. Overview of the Operations Research Modeling Approach
3. Introduction to Linear Programming
4. Solving Linear Programming Problems: The Simplex Method
5. The Theory of the Simplex Method
6. Duality Theory
7. Linear Programming under Uncertainty
8. Other Algorithms for Linear Programming
9. The Transportation and Assignment Problems
10. Network Optimization Models
11. Dynamic Programming
12. Integer Programming
13. Nonlinear Programming
14. Metaheuristics
15. Game Theory
16. Decision Analysis
17. Queueing Theory
18. Inventory Theory
19. Markov Decision Processes
20. Simulation
* WEB-ONLY (free):
* Glossaries
* 21. The Art of Modeling with Spreadsheets
* 22. Project Management with PERT/CPM
* 23. Additional Special Types of Linear Programming Problems
* 24. Probability Theory
* 25. Reliability
* 26. The Application of Queueing Theory
* 27. Forecasting
* 28. Examples of Performing Simulations on Spreadsheets with Analytic Solver Platform
* 29. Markov Chains
APPENDICES:
 1: Documentation for the OR Courseware
 2: Convexity
 3: Classical Optimization Methods
 4: Matrices and Matrix Operations
 5: Table for a Normal Distribution 

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, extracted PDF with OCR and (a tad too much) downsampling of some raster objects; vector part quasi perfect. Free web-only material (*) appended for convenience.
Compressed (zipped): *right-click* the filename (.7z) & choose *Extract* to convert to PDF; discard the .7z file (container) when done with seeding.
